document_data.name: Greenhaven
document_data.mainbody: The '''Greenhaven''' [[orc]]s were a tribe who lived in the [[Far Horns Forest]] during the time of [[Netheril]].
document_data.History: The Greenhaven orcs performed raids on nearby [[Netherese]] towns and villages, and also performed forays into [[the Moss]] to hunt [[troll]]s. They favored using flaming [[arrow]]s in their raids, but this ultimately resulted in the enraged trolls massing together and annihilating the tribe during Netheril's Silver Age.
